Package ore.api

This package contains the classes that are used by a developer to interface with the ORE system.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CollectionChangeListener Users implement this interface to be notified when a one-to-many or many-to-many collection has elements that are added or removed
PropertyChangeListener Users implement this interface to be notified when a property of a hibernate entity is modified directly.
 

Class Summary
DefaultCollectionChangeListener Convenience implementation of CollectionChangeListener for users who only want to implement one of the methods
Event Context data associated with an event for which a user wants to be notified.
HibernateUtil This class sets up the Hibernate metadata and sessionFactory the first time HibernateUtil.getSessionFactory is called.
ORE Developers use this class to register for mutation events.
 

Package ore.api Description

This package contains the classes that are used by a developer to interface with the ORE system. Developers may also use classes in ore.util if they are helpful. All other packages should not be used by developers.

See Also:
ore.util
